title: 820-01598-A not turning on 20V
message:
Good afternoon, guys.

The MacBook had gotten wet, the damaged components have already been replaced (including CD3217), it manages to go up to 20V - 1.30A but it resets to 0A.
Reviewing the Power sequencing diagram, the voltages reach the part of H9M LOAD SECURE ROM, SMC BATTERY TRAP: the last voltage before the restart, is the PCH_RTC_RESET_L; from there, there are no more voltages.

PPBUS = 12.57

Thanks and regards.

title: 820-01598-A not turning on 20V
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 75040, member: 682"]
It is recognized in DFU?
[/QUOTE]

Yes sir.

I try to update it, the progress bar advances 5-10%, quickly reaches the end and after several minutes, it throws error 4005.

title: 820-01598-A not turning on 20V
message:
Did you try revive, or restore option?
Be aware, restore will erase SSD; but must be needed.

message:
